 **********************************************************************/import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./About.css';import ImageGallery from'./ImageGallery';// Import the ImageGallery component
import{ABOUT_SECTION_TEXT,ABOUT_SECTION_GREETING,ABOUT_SECTION_GALLERY_SIZE}from'../personalizationConstants';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var About=function About(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"about-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:ABOUT_SECTION_GREETING}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"./about_images/image0.jpg",alt:"That's Me!",loading:"lazy"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about-text",children:ABOUT_SECTION_TEXT.map(function(text,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:text},index);})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-gallery-padding"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ImageGallery,{directory:"./about_images/",gallery_size:ABOUT_SECTION_GALLERY_SIZE})]});};export default About;
